name: Buildo - Construction diary
description: Buildo is an app specifically designed for construction companies. It allows simple construction diary management without unnecessary paperwork, making construction site management a lot easier. By using the app you can save hours and hours of time otherwise spent on diary writing. Weve developed Buildo to make it easier especially for small businesses with the intention to make administrative as easy as possible. As an example, Buildo includes these features:  Construction diary management  Evidence of workers, machinery, and material  Attaching of photos to records  Automatic weather determination  PDF export of construction diary, material and staff records   Email notifications about daily records  Reminders if the daily record is not filled  So take advantage of this new app and make your business more efficient!  More information here: https://buildoapp.com
